app/src/main/java/com/lxmf/messenger/ui/.description: ReactionUi data class added with emoji, senderHashes, and count fields. MessageUi now has reactions: List<ReactionUi> field for displaying emoji reactions on messages.

app/src/test/java/com/lxmf/messenger/ui/.description: ReactionMapperTest created with 50+ unit tests for parseReactionsFromField16(). Tests cover: null/empty JSON, invalid JSON, missing field 16, reactions parsing with single/multiple senders, empty sender filtering, Unicode emoji (including ZWJ sequences), coexistence with reply_to field, and edge cases.

app/src/main/java/com/lxmf/messenger/ui/.description: ReactionDisplayRow composable added for displaying emoji reaction chips below messages. Takes List<ReactionUi> and isFromMe parameters. Chips show emoji + count (count only visible when > 1). ReactionChip is a private helper component.

app/src/test/java/com/lxmf/messenger/ui/.description: ReactionComponentsTest.kt created with 26 Robolectric tests for ReactionPickerDialog and ReactionDisplayRow. Tests cover: all 6 emoji display, selection callbacks, empty/single/multiple reactions, count display logic (hidden for count=1, shown for count>1), isFromMe variants, Unicode edge cases (ZWJ sequences, flag emojis), and REACTION_EMOJIS constant verification.

app/src/main/java/com/lxmf/messenger/vie.description: buildFieldsJson() helper updated to support reactions parameter. Takes reactions: Map<String, List<String>>? where keys are emoji strings and values are lists of sender hashes. Serializes to Field 16 format alongside reply_to.

python/reticulum_wrapper.py.description: Reaction receive handling added in _on_lxmf_delivery() and poll_received_messages(). Reactions are detected via Field 16 with 'reaction_to' key. Event-driven notifications use kotlin_reaction_received_callback, polling uses is_reaction flag with reaction_to, reaction_emoji, reaction_sender fields in message_event dict. Reactions skip regular message queue processing (same pattern as location-only messages).

python/test_wrapper_reactions.py.description: Comprehensive test suite for ReticulumWrapper reaction methods (1010 lines). Tests: send_reaction method, reaction receive via _on_lxmf_delivery callback, reaction receive via poll_received_messages, set_reaction_received_callback, Field 16 structure validation, and edge cases. Follows patterns from test_wrapper_messaging.py.

reticulum/src/main/java/com/lxmf/messeng.description: sendReaction() method added to ReticulumProtocol interface for sending emoji reactions. Takes destinationHash, targetMessageId, emoji, sourceIdentity and returns Result<MessageReceipt>. Reactions sent via LXMF Field 16 with format {"reaction_to": "...", "emoji": "...", "sender": "..."}.
